duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the accounts payable and receivable, processing payroll, and conducting other tasks related to finance.
Monitor and track expenses, budget, taxes, cash flow, receipts, and other financial dealings of the company.
Provide regular financial reports (weekly, monthly, and yearly) and ensure timely processing of payroll.
Be excellent at recording data and producing clear financial reports.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in accounting or related field (Master's preferred)
